definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="-703" y="115"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="entity_send_chat"><comment pinned="false" h="217" w="331">As we want to send a message to one player only, we can just use the normal entity argument getter. This procedure can only be attached at the end of every argument as they are all required.</comment><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Benvenuto/a in Auxence!</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></next></block></xml>
